steps: Toast tortillas in a dry skillet over medium heat until browned on each side; stack and cover with foil.
Prepare the coleslaw dressing by combining mayonnaise, lime juice, cumin, cayenne, salt, and sugar.
Mix coleslaw base with green onions and dressing; refrigerate until needed.
Season fish pieces with combined chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, and salt.
Cook fish in batches using oil until firm, opaque, and flaked easily (few minutes per side).
Assemble tacos with fish, avocado slices, coleslaw, and jalapeño on tortillas.
title: Easy Fish Tacos with Cumin Lime Slaw
